column4: hi guys i try'd installing the 2.6.38.5 kernal to my 10.04 but after installing it get a nvidia errors does anyone know of this and the fix thanx
thats the problem, if you go ppa for a kernel you need to get the matching nvidia binary which is a pain
i think they spun the 210s into a mobile low power variant, its actually pretty new iirc
for legal reasons the deb cannot automatically install the whole thing. you have to do that manually
